dct_title_s: The Russian discoveries from the map published by the Imperial Academy of St. Petersburg
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Scales in "Sea Leagues 20 to a Degree" and "British Statute Miles 69 1/2 to a Degree."
Appears in the author's The American atlas. London : R. Sayer and J. Bennett, 1783.
Includes notes: "Explanation of the Russian names".
dct_publisher_sm: Printed for Robt. Sayer, Map & Printseller, no. 53 in Fleet Street
dct_rights_sm: Images from the David Rumsey Map Center's general collections courtesy of Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
